entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
